author: tomj
msg: Back out previous change (for now) which prevents the WSDL multiref

author: gdaniels
msg: * SAXParserFactory is not guaranteed to be thread safe, so wrap our
access to it in a synchronized method.
* We can't share Deserializers, as they have state which will get stomped
on if they're used by multiple threads.  Remove code which did this.  We
may revisit this type of thing later via some pooling mechanism, but they
still would have to be obtained, used, and then released - never shared

author: tomj
msg: Add jaxrpc.jar to the classpath instructions.
Update step 6 sample classpath instructions to include distribution directory.

author: tomj
msg: Move the construction of the bean object from the constructor to startElement()
This allows us to throw an exception with a reasonable error if we are unable
An example would be a bean without a default constructor.
